thread.section_title: Choice Home Warranty Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Choice Home Warranty | www.choicehomewarranty.com | 3 of 111
thread.title: Sharon Ceaser
thread.title_full: Choice Home Warranty reviewed by Sharon Ceaser

author: Sharon Ceaser
title: Sharon Ceaser
text: My dishwasher broke down and I called Choice Warranty. I was a little disappointed in the wait time about 3 minutes the first time, and we were disconnected. Five minutes wait time for a customer service person the next call. Other than that my experience was OUTSTANDING. They setup a claim immediately and dispatched a service repair person that made himself available around my schedule. My dishwasher, unfortunately, could not be repaired. Choice Warranty called and agreed to send a check so that I can purchase a new dishwasher. I am very satisfied with Choice Home Warranty! I will continue to be a loyal customer.
